verbose_text: This is caused by YopK inhibiting the phosphorylation / activation of TAK1 and IKK, which blocks apoptosis in response to infection, and enables GSDMD mediated cell death to predominate while other Yop proteins inhibit the activity of IL-1beta and its proinflammatory function.
evidence: caused by YopK inhibiting the phosphorylation/activation of TAK1
